# d-divider



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                   | Type                                                   | Default        |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | -------------- |
| `color`     | `color`     | 分割线颜色                         | `string`                                               | `"#bbb"`       |
| `direction` | `direction` | 分割线方向，可选值：horizontal、vertical | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                           | `"horizontal"` |
| `lineType`  | `line-type` | 分割线样式，可选值：solid、dashed、dotted | `"highDensityDashed" \| "lowDensityDashed" \| "solid"` | `"solid"`      |
| `margin`    | `margin`    | 分割线边距                         | `string`                                               | `"24px 0"`     |
| `size`      | `size`      | 分割线粗细                         | `string`                                               | `"1px"`        |
